text: F'Murr or F'Murrr (March 31, 1946 – April 10, 2018) whose real name was Richard Peyzaret, was a French comics creator. He was most famous for the long-running series Le Génie des alpages (The Genius of the Mountain Pastures). In 1978, F'Murr was awarded Angoulême International Comics Festival, Best Comic Book for Barre-toi de mon herbe. ==References== ==Other websites== *F'Murr biography on Lambiek Comiclopedia *F'Murr biography on Dargaud *L'art de F'Murr Interview Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:French artists Category:Writers from Paris
title: F'Murr
